subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Having goalie Martin Brodeur’s 18-year-old son, Anthony, who was selected as the 208th overall pick in the draft, in training camp was odd for both of them, they said.
snippet: Having goalie Martin Brodeur’s 18-year-old son, Anthony, who was selected as the 208th overall pick in the draft, in training camp was odd for both of them, they said.
